author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Department of Posts, India, has issued innovative miniature sheets of “3rd India Africa Forum Summit’ on Friday.

For the first time, the India Post has brought out innovative miniature sheet stamps with hot foil stamping and embossing.

The Indian Rhino, African Rhino and Black Buck are hot foil stamped with gun metal foil, the two lions with gold foil and the Thomson Gazelle with copper foil and all these stamps are embossed. The stamps have been priced at Rs. 200. The face value of the miniature sheet is Rs. 70, a press release from the Senior Superintendent of Post Offices, Salem East Division, issued here on Saturday said.

These stamps are available at Salem Head Post Officer, Attur Head Post Office and Yercaud Sub-Office, the release said.
title: Innovative miniature sheets
